maintext.whatisthisHTML: This is Aeterna.me, a completely free project. Developed to celebrate people's life stories and an attempt to bring it through the ages, it's both a Wikipedia of ordinary people's lives & ideas, as well as acts as a modern Cave of Hands.
maintext.ordinarylifes: There are a significant number of ordinary people whose voices will be forgotten. Let's fix that!
maintext.shareyourthougths: Pages on Wikipedia lack a human soul, and only consist of dry facts. Pages on Facebook will always fight for advertisers money.
maintext.ihope: I hope you enjoy OUR platform
maintext.norules: There are no rules, likes, ratings, or any kind of judgement. These things mean nothing when you are gone. Create an account and let the world know about yourself, or even someone else who has had an impact on your life
maintext.createaccount: You can also add any thoughts you may have on any subject to the archive, and set it to go public in 10, 20, 30, or even 100 years from now.
maintext.pleasemindHTML: To learn more about this project, visit my Patreon page or send me a message on Twitter
maintext.iwill: I will do whatever I can to keep this project running. However, there will be NO ads here, and also NO data of any kind will ever be sold. Please help me out by sharing this website with a friend!

msg.nocontent1: No public content found in selected language. Be first and
